typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		ID as string,
		Interface_ID as string,
		Date as string,
		Sequence as string,
		Start_time as string,
		End_Date as string,
		End_time as string,
		Start_Date as string,
		Status as string,
		Payroll_Period as string,
		Payroll_Year as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> BlobContainer
BlobContainer alterRow(upsertIf(ID == ID && Interface_ID == Interface_ID)) ~> UpdateOrInsert
UpdateOrInsert sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	input(
		ID as integer,
		Interface_ID as string,
		Date as string,
		Sequence as string,
		Start_time as string,
		End_Date as string,
		End_time as string,
		Start_Date as string,
		Status as string,
		Payroll_Period as string,
		Payroll_Year as string
	),
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:true,
	keys:['ID','Interface_ID'],
	format: 'table',
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	errorHandlingOption: 'stopOnFirstError',
	mapColumn(
		ID,
		Interface_ID,
		Date,
		Sequence,
		Start_time,
		End_Date,
		End_time,
		Start_Date,
		Status,
		Payroll_Period,
		Payroll_Year
	)) ~> AzureSQLDB
